title: Blazing 5 (6) - Week 15
itunes:title: Blazing 5 (6) - Week 15
description:
For the first time ever, Colin does a Blazing 6 and goes over his Blazing 6 picks with RJ Bell of Pregame.com and Fox Sports Radio who tells him which games the wise guys in Vegas agree or disagree with. Here are the games Colin and RJ go over in week 15:


Seattle at Carolina

Chicago at Green Bay

Houston at Tennessee

Jacksonville at Oakland

Los Angeles at Dallas

Buffalo at Pittsburgh


Plus, Colin reveals a 7th bonus pick exclusive to this podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
